text: TicketFire is an online ticket marketplace, which allows both mobile app and desktop users to buy and sell tickets to live entertainment events. Users are able to digitize hard copy tickets using TicketFires's technology and turn them in to usable electronic and mobile tickets. Tickets to sporting events, concerts and theater are available on TicketFire's marketplace. TicketFire has received funding from Rev1 Ventures, a seed-stage venture development organization. == References == Category:Online companies of the United States Category:Ticket sales companies
title: TicketFire
